scenario:
Visa Inc. (NYSE: V) class action lawsuit alleges that defendants made materially false and/or misleading statements and/or failed to disclose that Visa was not in compliance with federal antitrust laws and did not have effective internal programs and policies to assess and control compliance with federal antitrust laws. The lawsuit claims that investors suffered damages when the true details entered the market. The lead plaintiff deadline is January 20, 2025. 

Visa's stock price declined following the lawsuit's allegations. The company's stock price fell from $213.45 on September 23, 2024, to $204.11 on September 24, 2024, a decline of about 4.4% in the span of just one day.
